Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add security review for Feature 005 permission model

Documents 17 security findings \(3 critical, 5 high, 6 medium, 3 low\)
from a detailed file-by-file code audit of the permission model
implementation. Includes attack scenarios, fix recommendations, and
a prioritized remediation checklist.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
